articles.description: Watch live coverage from day seven of Wimbledon featuring defending men's champion Carlos Alcaraz and Emma Raducanu.
articles.title: Wimbledon 2024 LIVE: Alcaraz, Raducanu, Gauff in action - tennis order of play, scores & results

articles.description: Lewis Hamilton won a race-long fight with Max Verstappen and Lando Norris at a gripping, wet-dry British Grand Prix to take his first victory since December 2021.
articles.title: Lewis Hamilton wins British Grand Prix for ninth time

articles.description: Carlos Alcaraz holds off a late charge from 16th seed Ugo Humbert to win 6-3 6-4 1-6 7-5 to move into the last eight at Wimbledon.
articles.title: Wimbledon 2024 results: Carlos Alcaraz continues title defence with hard-fought win over Ugo Humbert

articles.description: Italian Jasmine Paolini secures her place in the Wimbledon quarter-finals for the first time after Madison Keys retires with an injury in the deciding set.
articles.title: Wimbledon 2024 results: Jasmine Paolini through after Madison Keys injury

articles.description: Britain's Tom Pidcock is pipped on the line as France's Anthony Turgis wins stage nine of the Tour de France.
articles.title: Tour de France: Tom Pidcock pipped & Tadej Pogacar retains yellow

articles.description: Laura Muir sets a new British women's 1500m record as Faith Kipyegon and Yaroslava Mahuchikh both break world records at the Paris Diamond League.
articles.title: Paris Diamond League: Laura Muir breaks British 1500m record as world records fall in Paris

articles.description: England's resilience and individual brilliance keeps them on course for glory as they seal a Euro 2024 semi-final against the Netherlands, writes Phil McNulty.
articles.title: England's resilience keeps them on course for Euro 2024 glory

articles.description: The Netherlands forward Gody Gakpo says "everyone knows each country can play a little bit better" before their Euro 2024 semi-final against England.
articles.title: Euro 2024: Dutch 'very close' to final but must overcome England

articles.description: For years England fans, players and pundits have feared the very mention of penalty shootouts - but thanks to new-found confidence and in-depth preparation, that is no longer the case.
articles.title: ‘Arrogance and confidence’ – England’s perfect Euro penalties
